This might be just a bit offtopic, but if you wanna play the original BARIS, the developers have ported it from DOS to modern windows and have released it for free under the GNU GPL: http://www.raceintospace.org/ . As for Mercury vs Gemini, i'd say only get Gemini if you have a disc drive or if you really like the idea of the game and are willing to pay the almost certain shipping costs to Thailand.
